summary: The Central Bureau of Investigation deputes two officers to investigate the disappearance of three medical students, which they believe to be an incident of 'honour killing' in a small, closed community.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Akshaye Khanna|Bipasha Basu|Paresh Rawal|Reema Sen|Amita Pathak|Sameera Reddy|Rajendra Gupta|Atul Tiwari|Jaideep Ahlawat|Rajesh Bakshi|Raymond D'Souza|Abhishek Singh Er|Jayant Gadekar|Ashraf Ul Haq|Ashutosh Jha|Swapnil kiiran Kotriwar|Arvind Kumar|Paritosh Sand|Urvashi Sharma|Vineet Sharma|Navinder Pal Singh|Pankaj Tripathi
keywords: violence against a woman|well|cell phone|man wears eyeglasses|police
title: Aakrosh
